channel.title: composite-index on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in composite-index on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Multi-column index in DB
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Multi-column index in DB Databases support creating composite indexes (index on multiple columns). If you specify the columns in the right order in the index definition, a single composite index can speed up several kinds of queries on the same table.
